MajorClaims.Text: These changes make cooking so easy-to-use and time-saving as to improve the way we live to a great extent
I would assert that this change has improved our life significantly

Claims.Text: the time-saving, simple food preparation process gives us more time to do other activities, more chance to select diverse kinds of foods and more willingness to cook meals
people have more chance to do other activities they like since food preparation is no longer time-consuming
since food preparation has become easier and more convenient, it is certainly great to preserve diverse kinds of foods at home
This transformation may bring positive impacts to family in some cases

Premises.Text: such a change has liberated many housewives from tedious cooking process and gave them additional time to do something more meaningful like accompanying family or doing a job
more people can sleep a bit later to go to work
they only need a couple of time to prepare for the breakfasts
People can have a variety of dishes even in a small meal and choose whatever they like
More men, on the other hand, are willing to participate in cooking that they had never done before
